message.name: DREHTEST
message.description: Contains the some Seeds system_t information + local time.
message.field: acceleration along x-axis, multiple of g
acceleration along y-axis, multiple of g
acceleration along z-axis, multiple of g
rotation rate of the rotor in rad/s
contains swashplate_servo1_amps, swashplate_servo2_amps, swashplate_servo3_amps and fin_servo_amps in this order.
bat1_volts (Battery block 1 voltage), bat2_volts (Battery block 2 voltage)
vertical velocity of the seed in m/s â€“ negative if seed is falling
absolute (to air/world frame) rotation rate of the rotor in rad/s"
absolute (to air/world frame) rotation rate of the body in rad/s"
setpoint for the pitch angle for the servos
imu_acc_avail, imu_gyro_avail, baro_avail, vacuum_baro_avail, tacho_rot_avail, servo_amps_avail, bat_temp_avail, volts_avail in this order with individual size of 1 bit
